Html:
Hi,

Are there a limit of markers?

I need to add like a 1.000 markers, but when I make over 100, my app stalls.

What to do?

Thanks!

Mojo

Sry my bad ... I had a bug - it's fine now.

Very cool control btw!!!

Mojo

..actually check constructor in demos, you can enable performance test and see how many markers it can actually handle, if you use wpf, you can increase that number by using FrameworkElement instead of custom control for markers shape.
